link.description: This section explains the vital functions of sleep and its profound impact on nearly every aspect of our physical and mental health. It highlights how sleep enhances memory, boosts learning, stabilizes emotions, supports the immune system, and helps regulate metabolism. Walker emphasizes the serious consequences of sleep deprivation, including increased risk of disease, mental decline, and emotional instability. Through scientific studies and real-world examples, Part 2 makes a compelling case for prioritizing sleep as a non-negotiable pillar of health and performance.
